snippet: Meeting reporters, Mr. Assad radiated confidence that he was firmly in control of his country, declaring that he planned to remain president until his term ends in 2021....
abstract: Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad appears calm and confident while addressing Western journalists and foreign policy experts at his palace; insists that his country is better off since advent of civil war that has killed half million people and reduced key cities to rubble; asserts West exacerbated conflict by supporting rebellion.
lead_paragraph: Meeting reporters, Mr. Assad radiated confidence that he was firmly in control of his country, declaring that he planned to remain president until his term ends in 2021.
